TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance found in certain plants, including burdock. It has shown anticancer effects. Arctiin belongs to a group of substances called lignans.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia que se encuentra en ciertas plantas, incluso la bardana. Ha mostrado tener efectos contra el c√°ncer. La arctiina es un tipo de lignano.
